Basic Advertising Site - Web Design & Development $1000
5-page interactive Web site (equivalent to five 8½" x 11" pages). Each page can include 2 images (illustrations or photos; camera-ready art required). Additional images can be included for $50 each.
Search engine registration and first hour of logo design included.

Need a custom site for your business?
No problem! YEP’s design staff will develop a unique site to your specifications.
The cost of a custom site varies with the complexity of the project. Pages start at
$200 each. (includes 2 images)

Domain Name Registration
A domain name (URL) is your site’s "address" on the Internet. Domain names are administered by Network Solutions Inc., which charges $70 for 2 years.
We will work with you to find the best URL available for your business.
Domain Registration & Set up fee: $50

Search Engine Registration
Your site is only successful if people know how to find you.
Along with advertising your site,  (see Banner ads)
you need to have it registered with the search engines (yahoo, lycos, hotbot, etc.)
on the internet that bring people to your site based on keywords they enter.
YEP will help you choose these keywords to optimize positioning within the search engines.

Hosting Services:
Basic Service includes 30 MB storage and 1GB transfer a month for $30 per month.
E-mail accounts- $10 each.

E-Mail Accounts
$10 each per month

Reports
Monthly usage reports are posted in a private directory on your web site.  $10 per month

Data Bases
Applications must be evaluated and are priced accordingly. Minimum charge is $20 per month

Graphic Design
The web allows you to animate your logo, ad dimension and spruce up any existing look you may have in print. Let us help you create an eye-catching display for your business. Our advertising site package includes 1 hour of design free. $75 an hour charges apply there after.

Marketing Strategy
A web site is one of the most effective marketing tools available -- combining the best aspects of print, broadcast and direct marketing. Whether your objective is to create awareness of your products and services, to provide customer service or to actually conduct commerce online, you'll find that the Internet is the quickest and easiest way to reach the fastest-growing segment of prospective customers.

Advertising Plan
   We offer an advertising plan that will optimize your exposure. We'll provide a written proposal
of the best placement and marketing strategy to promote your business on the web. $100


YEP will make it easy for you to develop an effective Internet presence. We'll work with you every step of the way from developing an effective online communications strategy through testing your site before it goes "live".

YEP understands that as an integral part of your public image, your web site must reflect the tone and style of your business. Our designers have the experience to create an Internet presence that will reflect the image you want -- from elegant, dignified professional sites to lively, entertaining online advertisements.
Contact YEP today to find out how easy it can be to "get on the 'Net."
